## Quick Start

```bash
# Run all new tests
pytest tests/integration/test_*simplif*.py -v

# Run with coverage
pytest tests/integration/test_*simplif*.py --cov=.github -v

# Run specific validation
pytest tests/integration/test_workflow_simplification_validation.py -v
```
